name: GRAVEN The Purple Moon Prophecy
description: THE PROPHECY IS COMING! An invitation to research ancient menhirs sends you to Brittany to find these magnificent standing stones. But you quickly discover there is far more at stake than groundbreaking research. There is a prophecy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 Processor: Processor 1.4 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c
